intro.heading: Your Complete Relocation Partner in Sweden
intro.description: Relocating to Sweden is an exciting journey, but it comes with challenges such as registering with Swedish authorities, applying for a personnummer, opening a bank account, arranging housing, and integrating into a new culture. At Sweden Relocators, we provide comprehensive destination services in Sweden for individuals, families, and corporate clients, ensuring a smooth transition from the moment you arrive until you are fully settled.
intro.capabilities: Our destination solutions cover arrival services, authority registrations, city orientation, housing search, integration support, family assistance, and departure management. Whether you are moving for work, studies, family reunification, or corporate assignments, our team makes the relocation process simple, compliant, and stress-free.

services.title: Arrival and Departure Support
details: Pre-Arrival Briefing – guidance on documents, housing options, and first steps in Sweden.
Meet & Greet – assistance at airports or transport hubs for a smooth arrival.
Temporary Accommodation – support with short-term housing while searching for a permanent home.
Departure Services – complete assistance when leaving Sweden, including deregistration, lease termination, shipment coordination, and closing of accounts.

services.title: Authority Registration and Legal Compliance
details: Personnummer Assistance – help with obtaining the Swedish personal identity number at Skatteverket, essential for healthcare, employment, and daily life.
ID Card Application – guidance on applying for the Swedish ID card, required for banking and official identification.
BankID Setup – support with Sweden's secure digital identification system, necessary for online banking, contracts, and government services.
Tax Registration and Coordination Numbers – assistance with samordningsnummer, employer registrations, and tax residency requirements.

services.title: Banking and Financial Services
details: Bank Account Opening – coordination with Swedish banks such as Swedbank, Handelsbanken, SEB, and Nordea.
Digital Payment Setup – guidance on Swish, Autogiro, and mobile banking solutions.
Payroll and Salary Transfers – ensuring smooth financial setup for employees and freelancers.

services.title: Housing and Neighborhood Orientation
details: Home Search Assistance – support with rentals and purchases tailored to your needs and budget.
Lease Negotiation – review and negotiation of contracts to ensure compliance with Swedish housing law.
Neighborhood Orientation – guided city tours highlighting schools, healthcare, shopping, and public transport.
Utility and Internet Setup – support with registering electricity, internet, insurance, and waste management.

services.title: Integration and Cultural Support
details: City Orientation Tours – helping newcomers understand local transportation, healthcare systems, and community resources.
Cultural Training – workshops and advice on Swedish customs, workplace culture, and social etiquette.
Language Learning Support – guidance on enrolling in Swedish For Immigrants (SFI) and private language schools.
Community and Networking – connections with expat groups, professional associations, and local networks.

services.title: Family and Education Support
details: School Search and Placement – guidance for international schools, preschools, and public schools.
Childcare Assistance – support in applying for daycare and preschool programs.
Family Integration Programs – cultural adaptation support for spouses and children.

corporateServices.heading: Destination Services for Companies and Employers
corporateServices.intro: For businesses relocating employees to Sweden, we provide corporate destination services that simplify mobility, reduce administrative burden, and improve employee satisfaction. Our corporate solutions include:
services: Pre-assignment consultations for HR and employees.
Residence permit and work permit coordination with immigration support.
Family relocation services, including housing and school placement.
Payroll, taxation, and insurance guidance for employees.
Ongoing integration and employee well-being support.
corporateServices.benefit: With our help, companies can focus on business goals while we ensure employees and their families settle into Sweden smoothly.
